## htmlToElement() function

Converts html string into html DOM

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function htmlToElement(html: string, doc?: HTMLDocument): HTMLElement;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  html | string | Html string to be converted to DOM |
|  doc | HTMLDocument | Optional html document to be used |

<b>Returns:</b>

HTMLElement
